citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1000 on
04-Jun-19.
I attempted to make contact by phone but was unable to. Please contact me at (240) 731-4240.
